metadata.title: CVE-2024-36615 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg n7.0 has a race condition vulnerability in the VP9 decoder. Thiscould lead to a data race if video encoding parameters were being exported,as the side data would be attached in the decoder thread while being readin the output thread.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
